wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Crawford Smith (1846–1907) was an English businessman and Liberal Unionist MP for Tyneside from 1900 to 1906.His wife was Hannah Ralston Lockhart, and his son was Norman Lockhart Smith.

response: *Hugh Smith (American football) (1934–2016), American football wide receiver
*Hugh Smith (politician) (1839–?), Ontario farmer and political figure
*Hugh Smith (news anchor) (1934–2007), news director and anchor at Tampa, Florida's WTVT
